name: study-abroad-course-mapping
description: Advisor explains how to pre-approve CS electives taken abroad.

events.content: Going to Florence for a quarter. How do I make sure the CS classes transfer as major electives?
There's a "Course Substitution Request (Study Abroad)" form on the International Center site.
List each foreign course with the host syllabus, note which Cal Poly course youâ€™d like it to replace, then submit to cscadvising@calpoly.edu before you depart. We review within two weeks.
Yes, as long as the contact hours match. Otherwise it counts as support credit.
